head: Zero To One
author: Author - Peter Thiel
content: The book explains why the next big entrepreneur will not have to build an operating system or a search engine. Instead, tomorrow’s champions are going to be those who look at a unique road that have not been taken.

head: Start-up Sutra
author: Author - Rohit Prasad
content: It is the true story of two founders of the IT organization. Bringing to life the daily dramas, and the battles with inner demons, this inspiring and multi-layered story is ready to change your life

head: The $100 start-up
author: Author - Chris Guillebeau
content: Do you want to read an author who has travelled across the world, and met with almost every known entrepreneur? He tells how investing even 100 $ in the right place can make you rich.

head: The hard thing about hard things
author: Author - Ben Horowitz
content: The book discusses practical wisdom for managing the toughest problems that business school doesn’t cover. Filled with humour and straight talk, it proves invaluable for every entrepreneur.

head: Doglapan
author: Author - Ashneer Grover
content: 'Doglapan: The Hard Truth about Life and Start-Ups' is a brutally honest and perceptive examination of the difficulties and realities faced by business owners. It provides incisive guidance and a shot of motivation for anyone navigating the unpredictably volatile start-up environment. Ashneer's open storytelling will give you a fresh understanding of the tenacity and tenacity needed to prevail in the challenging business environment.

head: Founders At Work
author: Author - Jessica Livingston
content: A fascinating compilation of interviews with successful entrepreneurs, 'Founders at Work' by Jessica Livingston takes a deep look into their adventures, successes, and disappointments. This book is an invaluable resource for prospective entrepreneurs, providing a wealth of inspiration, knowledge, and useful guidance to help them through the difficulties of creating a firm.

head: Connect The Dots7
author: Author - Rashmi Bansal
content: Rashmi Bansal's 'I Have a Dream' is an engrossing collection of true accounts of common people who dared to dream big and make a difference. This book is a celebration of the human spirit and a motivational resource for anybody hoping to make their dreams come true.

head: Built to Sell
author: Author - John Warrillow
content: The book 'Built to Sell' by John Warrillow is a must-have resource for business owners trying to build a profitable, useful, and ultimately marketable enterprise. This book is a requirement-read for aspiring and seasoned entrepreneurs alike since it offers priceless ideas on how to maximise the value of your business and position it for a successful exit.
